text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.15%
       advanced 1.13% to $393.87 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 0.88% to 4,780.94 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       rising 0.54% to 37,468.61. Microsoft Corp. closed $0.16 below its 52-week high ($394.03), which the company achieved on January 16th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        +0.53%
       rose 3.26% to $188.63, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +2.04%
       rose 1.47% to $144.99, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +2.15%
       rose 1.42% to $143.48. Trading volume (22.0 M) remained 3.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 25.8 M.
